column62: I was very honored to be given the opportunity to attend SAGE this year, and even though it was virtual, this was an amazing experience for me. I was able to meet many inspiring women who led interesting lives, and who are now making scientific advancements in their field through dedication and perseverance. I was also able to participate alongside girls like myself who shared similar interests as me, and the organizers of the camp clearly had a lot of passion for it, and the energy they showed was contagious. It made my day brighter and I looked forward to each day. I found confidence in my skills and worked towards accepting myself for who I am through professional growth sessions. I realized that I had potential to be as great as them along with my fellow peers. This is an experience I'll remember for a long time, and where I'll apply the knowledge I've learned. I'd like to once again thank everyone who made this happen, and continue on my SAGe journey.
